data.sampled: The time signature 2/4 indicates that there are 2 beats per measure and the quarter note gets one beat. Adding up the number of beats for each note tempo value: - Half Note = 2 beats - Whole note = 4 beats - Eighth Note = 1/2 beat - Quarter Note = 1 beat - Sixteenth Note = 1/4 beat Therefore, the total number of measures for the provided note tempo values is: 2 + 4 + 1/2 + 1 + 1 + 2 + 1 + 2 + 4 + 1/2 + 2 + 1 + 1 + 1/4 + 1/2 + 1/4 + 1/4 + 1/4 + 1 + 1/4 + 2 + 1 = 23 So the answer is 23 measures.
